work.summary: Finero Pay Project with React Native
highlights: Improved client development workflow by incorpating modern tools like: React, Style Components, Redux Authentication, React Native, Express.

As a Front End Developer, I developed with my team hybrid app with react native for both platforms IOS and Android, i developed some parts of UI with functionality and some authentication for tokens and implement services in the front-end for the task and features, i used jira and bit bucker for manage agile and software development
